price: Rabbiin Isatu akkaan hiree kennaa, abbaa humna cimaati.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِينُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha huwa al-razāqu dhū al-quwati al-matīnu
